long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cat Companion: Your Purr-fect Browsing Buddy!

Introducing Cat Companion, the charming Chrome extension that brings a delightful feline friend to your browsing experience!

 üêæ Features:

- Adorable Animations: Watch your cat companion idle, play, and walk across your browser window.
- Interactive: Mouse over to see your cat play, click to make it walk.
- Unobtrusive: Your furry friend sits quietly in the corner, never interfering with your browsing.
- Random Actions: Experience surprise moments as your cat occasionally decides to take a stroll on its own.
- Customizable: [Future update] Choose from a variety of cat breeds and colors to match your preferences.

üê± Why Cat Companion?

In today's fast-paced digital world, we could all use a little companionship, even in our browsers! Cat Companion brings a touch of warmth and fun to your online activities. Whether you're working, studying, or just casually browsing, your virtual kitty is there to keep you company and bring a smile to your face.

üñ±Ô∏è How to Use:

1. Install the extension.
2. Open any webpage and look for your new feline friend in the bottom-right corner.
3. Hover your mouse over the cat to see it play.
4. Triple Click on the cat to make it walk away from a button.
5. Enjoy random moments of cat activity as you browse!

üîÆ Future Updates:

We're constantly working to improve your Cat Companion experience. Look forward to these upcoming features:
- Multiple cat breeds and colors to choose from
- Customizable behaviors and interactions
- Mini-games to play with your cat
- Sound effects for a more immersive experience


Bring some feline charm to your browsing today with Cat Companion ‚Äì because every internet journey is better with a furry friend!

Note: Cat Companion is purely for entertainment purposes and does not collect any user data.
